songs.title: Mi Sangre
songs.lyrics:
Es la raza que habla
Es la sangre que arde
El odio que crece
En los corazones del pueblo

Discriminación – Aniquilación
Es mi raza!

Fight....
Fight for your rights
Fight....
Fight for your rights

It's my race that speak
It's my blood that burn
It's the hate that's growing
So deep inside in my heart

Discriminación – Aniquilación
Es mi raza!

Fight....
Fight for your rights
Fight....
Fight for your rights
